summary:
V.3.2 out now! Semi - realism merged with extreme cinematic look. Unique effects - perfectly crafted.
finetuned - extreme atmosphere
- THE ENB WITH THE HIGHEST ENDORSEMENT / DOWNLOAD RATIO EVER -
The BEST that can happen to your Skyrim
descriptionHtml:
[center]
V.3.2 "R"elease "V"ersion out now!


The new 0.279 binary version
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/67548/?]C L I C K[/url]



[font=Trebuchet MS]L a B e a t B e a t b o x[/font]

presents



[b][size=4][font=Trebuchet MS]ZAAK LIIR _ ///Advanced FX         V.3.2[/font]
[/size][/b][font=Trebuchet MS]T H E     u l t i m a t e     v i s u a l     e x p e r i e n c e[/font]


[img]http://static-6.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/65151-3-1435375459.jpg[/img]


[font=Times New Roman]Zaak Liir enb is not only a new approach to the bloom effect. This is a semi realistic,
dark and sinister styled enb with a huge load of cinematic effects. Sunny days come with realistic brightness
and shadows. On the other Hand fog is a lot darker than most other enbs, rain will literaly drain the brightness, even
mid day. While this is a cinematic preset, I tried to keep it as balanced as possible - no oversaturated sepia-colorgrading
or anything you could become tired of while playing (having K-enb like lensflares will
be good for screenarchery, but after a few days of playing, you 
definitely had enough).


My utmost concern was to prevent a graphics "overdose".
Yet I tried to use as many effects as possible.

 ---> Great synergy with [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/66971/?]Dark fantasy overhaul[/url]! <---

[youtube]c7G31mJhZb8[/youtube]


H A V E   A   Q U I C K   L O O K   A T   Z A A K   L I I R   3 . 0   E N B   I N   A C T I O N
Using this enb on ultra setting with GTX 750 ti (with depth of field) gives you 50 - 60 fps outside.




[img]http://static-6.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/65151-2-1435375459.jpg[/img]



"You sit there, in front of the small campfire that you have set up for the night.
This is the only beacon you will have until the dawn breaks the darkness."


[img]http://static-6.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/65151-1-1435375459.jpg[/img]


Z A A K   L I I R   E N B   F E A T U R E S

a    customised    bloom    shader

physically correct depth of field effect

high quality image space based lens flare shading

optimised      cinematic      coloration

cinematic  color  grading  and  tonemapping

color       dispersion 

pixel      based      blur      shading

26% - 16/9      letterbox      (TRU CINEMA)

High Dynamic Range ( HDR ) tone mapping curve

TWO    seperate    sharpening    samplers

readjustied lighting for a more balanced and cinematic look

high  quality  +  performance  optimised  ambient  occlusion

_____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
_____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________


[img]http://static-6.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/65151-0-1435375459.jpg[/img]
[/font][/center][font=Times New Roman]
[/font][center][b][font=Times New Roman]---> I M P O R T A N T <---[/font][/b][/center][font=Times New Roman]

Without the correct binaries, this enb will not look as intended. For support of the newest binaries ( 0.279 ) check out [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/67548/?]Zaak Liir 4.35[/url]
This enb is not compatible with any lighting mod / weather mod ( this includes "Realistic Lighting Overhaul" - which causes too bright fire effects )
So remove COT , ELE, RLO, and any other lighting AND weather system altering mods you have installed, and get yourself the requiered enb binaries [url=http://enbdev.com/mod_tesskyrim_v0132.htm]HERE
[/url]
I highly recommend the use of the [url=http://enbseries.enbdev.com/forum/viewtopic.php?t=1499]enb particle patch[/url] . Some objects, interior dust and especially water foam will look off without it ( especially at night time ).

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Instructions for Installation of the preset are included in the download
Using different enb binaries will most likely make your game look off.

The sunray shader is not activated ON PURPOSE - I dont think it fits the style of this preset. So the brightness of the sun and sunglare are adjusted to be 
used without the sunray shader.
But If you want to use it, I recommend to set the intensity to a value between 0.1 and 0.3 (but its your choice after all)


All pictures are 1080x1920 and can be used as Desktop-Wallpapers




Have fun[/font]
author: LaBeatBeatbox
